## DynamicRingBuffer.getStats() method

Get resize statistics

**Signature:**

```typescript

        resizeCount: number;
        lastResizeTime: number;
        currentCapacity: number;
        utilization: number;
        resizeThreshold: number;
        shrinkThreshold: number;
    };
```
**Returns:**

{ resizeCount: number; lastResizeTime: number; currentCapacity: number; utilization: number; resizeThreshold: number; shrinkThreshold: number; }
